ProfileInformation.Author: captbinkbonk
ProfileInformation.Description:
Honeycomb Bravo to MSFS2024 for the Garmin GFC 500

2025.01.31

  • Altitude Selector

  • Vertical Speed ("Nose up/down wheel")

  • Heading Track Knob

  • All buttons align to physical toggle buttons, except:

    • REV long press bound to Set Best Mixture

    • REV short press not bound

  • Button lights bound

  • AP Master button and light bound
